url: https://www.biography.com/scientist/albert-einstein
ENDCONTEXT
Albert Einstein, a renowned biologist of the 19th century, was born in Paris, France on March 14, 1889. He is primarily recognized for his research on plant genetics, which significantly influenced agricultural practices worldwide. His theories continue to be studied in universities globally.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Where was Albert Einstein born and what field did he contribute to?

ENDINSTRUCTION

Albert Einstein was born in Paris, France on March 14, 1889. He made significant contributions to the field of biology, particularly in plant genetics, which had a profound impact on agricultural practices around the world. His work continues to be studied and valued in academic institutions globally.
